title: 刚开始好好的minecraft现在出现这些文字。
author: 【美琪】
txt_content:
Mods loaded: 3
ModLoader 1.1
mod_ReiMinimap v3.0_01 [1.1]
mod_TooManyItems 1.1 2012-01-12a
      Minecraft has crashed!      
      ----------------------      
Minecraft has stopped running because it encountered a problem.
If you wish to report this, please copy this entire text and email it to support@mojang.com.
Please include a description of what you did when the error occured.

--- BEGIN ERROR REPORT ff3e2901 --------
Generated 12-2-18 下午6:13
Minecraft: Minecraft 1.1
OS: Windows XP (x86) version 5.1
Java: 1.6.0_30, Sun Microsystems Inc.
VM: Java HotSpot(TM) Client VM (mixed mode), Sun Microsystems Inc.
LWJGL: 2.4.2
OpenGL: GeForce GT 440/PCI/SSE2/3DNOW! version 4.2.0, NVIDIA Corporation

 at net.minecraft.client.Minecraft.run(SourceFile:648)

····大概翻译了一下··说的是····




MODS装：3
ModLoader 1.1
mod_ReiMinimap v3.0_01 [1.1]
mod_TooManyItems 1.1 2012-01-12A

      minecraft已经坠毁！

minecraft已停止运行，因为它遇到了一个问题。

如果你想报告，请复制这整个文本，并通过电子邮件发送到support@mojang.com~~V。
请包括你做了什么时出错的描述。

replies.author: l26107
replies.txt_content: 大体上看好像是CJB出现了什么问题...
这样的话 一般是装mod装崩溃了= =

replies.author: 路邊電燈泡
replies.txt_content: Mod裝到崩潰不解釋，把TMI換掉試試看

replies.author: 【美琪】
replies.txt_content:
路邊電燈泡 发表于 2012-2-18 19:42 
Mod裝到崩潰不解釋，把TMI換掉試試看
额······刚才玩的时候好好的···过几分钟后··就成这样了··
